projects.title: Mutiny
projects.shortDescription: Card game demo with modular gameplay mechanics.
projects.fullDescription: Independently designed and developed 'Mutiny', a card game demo available online. Handled game design, art, and coding. Features dozens of cards and gameplay mechanics built on a modular architecture, allowing easy expansion and customization.
features: Dozens of unique cards with modular mechanics
Independent handling of art, design, and code
projects.challenges: Managing all aspects of game development independently while ensuring a modular and maintainable architecture for future expansion.

projects.title: Project Paranoia
projects.shortDescription: Horror game demo featuring escape room mechanics and atmospheric environments.
projects.fullDescription: Developed 'Project Paranoia', a horror game demo that combines escape room mechanics with immersive atmospheric environments. The project involved level design, scripting, and implementing sound design to enhance the horror experience.

media.caption: Gameplay demo showing escape room mechanics and atmosphere

features: Escape room style puzzles and mechanics
Integrated sound design for enhanced horror experience
projects.challenges: Creating a tense and immersive horror atmosphere while designing engaging escape room mechanics using Unreal Engine 5's Blueprint system.

projects.title: Custom ECS Game Engine
projects.shortDescription: A lightweight 3D ECS game engine built from scratch in C++.
projects.fullDescription: Developed a lightweight 3D ECS game engine from the ground up using C++. The engine features a modular design, supporting rendering, input handling, and scene management. It serves as a foundation for learning and experimenting with game development concepts.

media.caption: Engine rendering a sample scene with a custom shader as skybox

features: Assets compilation for optimized loading times
projects.challenges: Designing a flexible ECS architecture while ensuring performance and maintainability in C++.
